name: Ann M. FELDMAN v. BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF EAST CALN TOWNSHIP, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown. Petition of Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown

parties: Ann M. FELDMAN v. BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF EAST CALN TOWNSHIP, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown. Petition of Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of June, 2013, the Application for Post-Submission Communication is GRANTED, and Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
71 A.3d 245
Ann M. FELDMAN v. BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF EAST CALN TOWNSHIP, Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown. Petition of Progressive Housing Ventures, LLC, J. Loew Associates, Inc., and Borough Council of the Borough of Downingtown.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 28, 2013.
